title: Sketchware 2D Game Engine
description: A full functioning 2D game project made specifically for Sketchware. Providing essential tools and functionalities to build 2D games directly in Sketchware.

title: SH Recovery
description: A lightweight tool to make a backup of your Sketchware projects in one tap. It has tools like clone, cleaner, and recover broken projects.

title: Tekogram
description: A complete WhatsApp app clone UI, with the green circular status feature like Instagram.

title: WhatsApp Bot
description: A bot that runs as an Android app using Android's notification utility. Can perform basic text replies, and can be customized for dictionary, scraper, and other functionalities.

title: K' Player
description: A very simple and basic music player app I have ever made. No special features though.

title: SGE Studio
description: An RPG map maker app specifically made for Sketchware 2D Game Engine, with custom export features.

title: K' Rhythm
description: A basic rhythm game with one mode, like Guitar Hero, but simpler.

title: Sprite Splitter
description: A tool to split a single image into pieces, supporting multiple formats. Mainly used by 2D RPG game devs who are lazy to split their image assets programmatically.

title: Sketchware Forum
description: An unofficial Sketchware Forum app abandoned for 4 years. It has a beautiful landing page design.

title: Sketchware 3D Game Engine
description: A working 3D renderer made with pure Java for Sketchware. It was a port of a big 3D library from GitHub.

title: SH Cloud
description: Basicly a SH Recovery-like but only backup to clouds and run-in-background to ensure your projects completely safe.
